faqs.q: How many calories in a bean and cheese burrito from Taco Bell?
faqs.a: Approximately 350 calories for one standard burrito.

faqs.q: What are the macros for a Taco Bell bean burrito?
faqs.a: About 50 g carbs, 13 g protein, 11 g fat, with 2 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is the Taco Bell bean and cheese burrito vegetarian?
faqs.a: Yes, it's vegetarian with refried beans, cheese, and no meat.

faqs.q: How much sodium in a Taco Bell bean burrito?
faqs.a: Around 980 mg per burrito, so watch intake if on a low-sodium diet.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie version of the bean and cheese burrito?
faqs.a: Yes, opt for Fresco style or skip cheese to reduce by up to 80 calories.
